SLOT rmhConfigAliases
    INSERT {
        property alias rmhDocumentTogglesHack: values.rmhDocumentTogglesHack
    }
END SLOT

SLOT rmhConfigProperties
    INSERT {
        property bool rmhDocumentTogglesHack: true
    }
END SLOT

SLOT rmhSettingsToolbarModel
    INSERT {
        {
            label: "Document-level toggle buttons",
            description: "Additional toggle buttons accessible from the document-level settings menu.",
            checked: Values.rmhDocumentTogglesHack,
            action: () => { Values.rmhDocumentTogglesHack = !Values.rmhDocumentTogglesHack },
        },
    }
END SLOT

AFFECT /xofm/libs/toolbar/impl/SettingsMenu.qml
    IMPORT common 1.0
    IMPORT com.remarkable 1.0
    IMPORT device.global 1.0
    IMPORT device.ui.controls 1.0

    TRAVERSE ToolbarTool > Component#settingsComponent > ColumnLayout
        LOCATE AFTER ALL INSERT SLOT rmhShareToolFoldoutModel
    END TRAVERSE
END AFFECT
